name: FlavorBotFlavoroftheDay
0: ”Alexa, ask Flavor Bot for the flavor of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flavor bot
des: Flavor bot reports Goodberry's Frozen Custard flavor of the day. Data is pulled from www.goodberrys.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
